contents.content: UNIT 05 常用求职信函 Common Application Letters
玛丽在大学时是班长，她的同学汤姆想让玛丽为其写封推荐信，玛丽就和杰克商讨写推荐信的一些事项。

contents.title: 玛丽：我遇到点小麻烦，不知道该怎么处理。
contents.answer: Mary: I have a little trouble, and I don't know how to deal with it.

contents.title: 杰克：怎么了？告诉我，或许我能帮你。
contents.answer: Jack: What's the matter? Please tell me. Maybe I can help you.

contents.title: 玛丽：汤姆想让我给他写封推荐信，但是我不知道该怎么写。
contents.answer: Mary: Tom wants me to write a recommendation letter for him, but I don't know how to write it.

contents.title: 杰克：不用担心，我了解这个。
contents.answer: Jack: Don't worry. I know about this.

contents.content: 推荐信的开头最好写明收信人的姓名，这样会令收信人更感亲切。如果无法知道确切的姓名，可以统称为先生或者女士(Dear Sir/ Madam)，或者用国际上比较流行的用法，即“致有关人士”(To Whom It May Concern)。

contents.title: 玛丽：真的吗？快给我说说。
contents.answer: Mary: Really? Tell me without delay.

contents.title: 杰克：首先是称呼，可以是公司的名字，也可以是个人的。
contents.answer: Jack: First you should have a salutation, which can be the company's or a person's name.

contents.title: 玛丽：好的，我知道了。
contents.answer: Mary: Well, I see.

contents.title: 杰克：之后可以写他的在校表现，包括他的学习成绩和个人能力。
contents.answer: Jack: Then you can write about his performance in college, including his academic achievements and his competence.

contents.title: 玛丽：这个好写。
contents.answer: Mary: It's easy to write those.

contents.title: 杰克：你也可以写一下他的性格特点、业余爱好以及跟同学之间的关系等情况。
contents.answer: Jack: You can also state his personality traits, hobbies and relationships with schoolmates and so on.

contents.content: 写推荐信时，要根据被推荐者的真实情况，有选择性地进行润色。要多写被推荐者的优点和长处，充分肯定他的成绩，语气要肯定积极，比如，可以介绍被推荐者的成就、抱负和个人品德等。但也不要一味地夸赞，适当地提些小缺点会让推荐信看起来更加真实，更容易被对方接受。

contents.title: 玛丽：汤姆跟同学们相处得很好，他真的是一个好男孩。
contents.answer: Mary: Tom got along very well with classmates. He is really a good boy.

contents.title: 杰克：你可以把他的优点都写在推荐信里面。
contents.answer: Jack: You can write all his strengths in the recommendation letter.

contents.title: 玛丽：除了这些，我还应该写些什么呢？
contents.answer: Mary: What should I write except these?

contents.title: 杰克：你还应该写明你是他的班长，因此你有资格写这封推荐信。
contents.answer: Jack: You should also state that you are his class president, so you are qualifi ed to write this recommendation letter.

contents.title: 玛丽：好的，我记住了。
contents.answer: Mary: OK, I will remember.

contents.content: 另外，语言方面要表达准确、突出重点、简明扼要，切忌模棱两可、笼统概括。为了增强真实性，也可以列举一些具体的实例来加以说明。

contents.title: 1.他为人诚实，思想成熟，活力十足。
contents.answer: He is honest, mature and energetic.

contents.title: 2.他具有独立完成工作的能力。
contents.answer: He has the ability to work independently.

contents.title: 3.我强力推荐她，因为她能快速适应新的环境。
contents.answer: I strongly recommend her because she can swiftly adapt to a new environment.

contents.title: 4.我认为她能够应对较大的工作压力。
contents.answer: I think she can deal with great work pressure.

contents.title: 5.你会发现他是一个反应快、有进取心的人。
contents.answer: You will find that he has a quick mind and is motivated.

contents.title: 6.他有极强的领导能力。
contents.answer: He has strong leadership ability.

contents.title: 7.他工作效率高，做事有条理。
contents.answer: He is effi cient in his work and always does things systematically.

contents.title: 8.他最主要的品质就是吃苦耐劳。
contents.answer: His main quality is hardworking.

contents.title: 9.我认为她善于跟各种人打交道。
contents.answer: I think she is good at dealing with all kinds of people.

contents.title: 10.我认为她具有良好的表达能力和人际沟通能力。
contents.answer: I think she has good skills in presentation and interpersonal communication.

contents.hanyi: adj. 有理解力的，善于领会的
adj. 有抱负的，有追求的
